metadata.title: RHEA-2015:1074: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6.4.1 update on RHEL 7 (Low)
metadata.description:
Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6 is a platform for Java
applications based on JBoss Application Server 7. 

This release updates and replaces Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application
Platform 6.4 and includes both bug fixes and enhancements. Documentation
for these changes are available in the Red Hat JBoss Enterprise
Application Platform 6.4.1 Release Notes, linked to in the References. 

All users of Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6.4 on Red Hat
Enterprise Linux 7 are advised to upgrade to these updated packages. The
JBoss server process must be restarted for the update to take effect.

bugzilla.text: EAP: LDAP bind password is being logged with TRACE log level

platform: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform 6.4 for RHEL 7
